response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value to you, I propose an offer of $1,200,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the significant savings compared to its value to you at $1,500,000. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1200000}
